examples.sentence: The computer is fast and reliable.
We use computers for work and study.
examples.translation: Мы используем компьютеры для работы и учебы.

examples.sentence: Computers have changed the world.
The smartphone has a great camera.
We use smartphones every day.
Smartphones are essential for communication.
The internet is a vast resource.
We rely on the internet for information.
examples.translation: Мы полагаемся на интернет для получения информации.

examples.sentence: The internet connects people worldwide.
examples.translation: Интернет соединяет людей по всему миру.

examples.sentence: The software is easy to use.
We installed new software on the computer.
examples.translation: Мы установили новое программное обеспечение на компьютер.

examples.sentence: Software is essential for modern devices.
examples.translation: Программное обеспечение необходимо для современных устройств.

examples.sentence: The hardware is powerful and durable.
We upgraded the hardware in our computer.
examples.translation: Мы обновили аппаратное обеспечение в нашем компьютере.

examples.sentence: Hardware includes components like the CPU and RAM.
examples.translation: Аппаратное обеспечение включает компоненты, такие как процессор и оперативная память.

examples.sentence: The keyboard is wireless.
We typed on the keyboard.
Keyboards are essential for computers.
The mouse is easy to use.
We moved the mouse to click.
A mouse helps navigate the computer.
The monitor has high resolution.
We connected the monitor to the computer.
Monitors display visual information.
The printer is out of ink.
We printed the document on the printer.
Printers are useful for creating hard copies.
examples.translation: Принтеры полезны для создания бумажных копий.

examples.sentence: The scanner is high-quality.
We scanned the photo using the scanner.
examples.translation: Мы отсканировали фото с помощью сканера.

examples.sentence: Scanners digitize physical documents.
The laptop is lightweight and portable.
We use the laptop for work and travel.
examples.translation: Мы используем ноутбук для работы и путешествий.

examples.sentence: Laptops are convenient for on-the-go use.
examples.translation: Ноутбуки удобны для использования в дороге.

examples.sentence: The tablet has a touchscreen.
We use the tablet for reading and browsing.
examples.translation: Мы используем планшет для чтения и просмотра.

examples.sentence: Tablets are great for entertainment.
The router provides Wi-Fi access.
We connected the router to the modem.
Routers are essential for internet connectivity.
examples.translation: Роутеры необходимы для подключения к интернету.

examples.sentence: The modem connects to the internet.
We installed the modem in the office.
Modems convert digital signals.
The camera takes high-quality photos.
We used the camera to record the event.
examples.translation: Мы использовали камеру, чтобы записать событие.

examples.sentence: Cameras are essential for photography.
